## ğŸ“– General Description
Coordinate with backend team to set up event indexing service for MarketplaceV1 contract events, enabling real-time notifications and transaction tracking.

**Category:** Integration & Deployment

**Technical Context:** Backend needs to index events: ListingCreated, ListingUpdated, ListingCancelled, SellerStaked, StakeWithdrawn, GenesisSellerJoined. Provide contract address after deployment to Base Sepolia. Backend will use Viem to poll for events. Smart contract team should document event schemas and provide ABI.

## Definition of Done
- [ ] Contract deployed to Base Sepolia
- [ ] Contract address shared with backend team
- [ ] Event schemas documented
- [ ] ABI synced to backend via sync_abis.py
- [ ] Backend confirms successful event indexing
- [ ] Peer review completed

## ğŸ› ï¸ How to Implement
1. **Deploy:** Deploy MarketplaceV1 to Base Sepolia (Issue #16)
2. **Document:** Create event schema documentation
3. **Sync:** Ensure ABIs are synced to apps/backend/app/abi/
4. **Coordinate:** Share contract address with backend team
5. **Verify:** Test event emission and backend indexing
